{{{*}}} RMM = Richardson Maturity Model (Level 0 to Level 3)
 * Reference: http://jim.webber.name/downloads/presentations/2009-05-HATEOAS.pdf (Page 4)
   Also http://www.crummy.com/writing/speaking/2008-QCon/act3.html (QCon 2008 slides) 
 * Level 0
   * SOAP, XML RPC, POX 
   * Single URI
 * Level 1
   * URI Tunnelling 
   * Many URIs, Single verb
 * Level 2
   * Many URIs, many verbs 
   * CRUD services (e.g. Amazon S3)
 * Level 3
   * Level 2 + Hypermedia
   * RESTful Services

conneg = Support for Content Negotiation

{{{[1]}}} Exyus does not automatically generate hypermedia links, but developers have full control over representations via XSLT transformations
